titleStmt.title: The good old cause briefly demonstrated with advertisements to authority concerning it, to the end, all persons may see the cause of their bondage, and way of deliverance.
titleStmt.author: Hubberthorn, Richard, 1628-1662.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: R.H. [Richard Hubberthorn. Cf. BM.]
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
